Committee: Veterans, Homeland Security And Military Affairs

Actions.Text: REFERRED TO VETERANS, HOMELAND SECURITY AND MILITARY AFFAIRS

Title: Requires a 120-day warning period for violations at certain veterans' organization facilities
Summary: Requires a 120-day warning period for violations at congressionally chartered veterans' organization facilities.
LawCode: Add ยง397-c, Gen Bus L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the general business law, in relation to requiring a one hundred twenty-day warning period for certain violations at certain veterans' organization facilities
